Key Match Events: Jofra Archer's brilliant bowling performance to picked up 3-wickets for 23-runs in 4-overs including a maiden
Jason Roy and Jos Buttler set up the third highest first-wicket partnership for England against India in T20 internationals
India scored 124-7 in 20 overs with top scorer by Shreyas Iyer struck 67 off 48-balls
Post-Match Reflections: Jofra Archer named Player of the match for his brilliant bowling performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jason Roy fell one-run short of his half-century
England chased 130-2 in 15.3 overs with strike rate of 153.13
Others: The match was played at Narendra Modi Stadium, Motera, Ahmedabad
